Description: Sherd of base of East Greek pottery pedestal. Interior reserved; exterior slipped; on outside of foot key meander band; three bands at edge of upper surface; frieze of rays alternating with dots, pendant from double line. Pink clay with white inclusions and moderate mica. Stand surface worn.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GO.773)
